About Me

Some background

Matt Germeyer

Software Developer from South Texas. Lived in Austin since finishing school here in 2008. Into gaming and photography. I love to cook, take snapshots of my cats, and watch documentaries.

Austin Code Academy

Full Stack Developer

Curriculum development for Java Spring portion of a Full Stack development boot camp for a cohort of Dell employees. Developed lectures, problem sets, and projects for students. Provided ongoing mentorship and tutoring as the team member responsibl for helping struggling students.

Current Focus

Should I Watch? App

My current project is a spin off of one of my previous projects about Soccer. The goal is to help users decide if a soccer match is worth watching, without spoiling its score line. This way users can make better choices about the games they choose to spend 90 minutes watching. I'm using Tweets, natural language processing, and my own algorithm to decide what makes a game good! Stay tuned for updates on my projects!

Freelancer

Real Estate Industry

Worked as a freelancer transitioning an older java project into a modern Spring project. Freelancing helped me learn to love Web Development, learn some skills dealing directly with client needs and project/time management.
